content: समुत्थानं {@--1@} Rising, getting up. {@--2@} Resurrection. {@--3@} Perfect cure, complete recovery. {@--4@} Healing (as of a wound); <ls>Ms. 8. 287</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 222.</ls> {@--5@} A symptom of disease. {@--6@} Engaging in industry, active occupation; as in संभूयसमुत्थानं <ls>Ms. 8. 4.</ls> {@--7@} Increase or growth.
